name: Peak Rewards for Smart Thermostats
description: $35 per year for enrolling Google Nest or Sensi smart thermostat in demand response program; thermostat auto-adjusts during peak events with option to override
fullDescription: San Jose Clean Energy pays customers annually for enrolling eligible smart thermostats in their demand response program, with automatic adjustments during peak events.
whatTheyOffer:
- $35 per year for thermostat enrollment
- Compatible with Google Nest or Sensi
- Automatic adjustments during peak events
- Option to override any adjustment
- Set-and-forget participation
- Annual payment for participation
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Jose Clean Energy customer
2. Must have Google Nest or Sensi smart thermostat
3. Enroll thermostat through program portal
4. Allow thermostat to connect to program
5. Thermostat auto-adjusts during peak events
6. Override option always available
keywords: SJCE, San Jose Clean Energy, Peak Rewards, smart thermostat, $35 per year, Nest, Sensi, demand response, automatic
